titles.title: Honoring the service of Gerard Latortue, Haiti's Interim Prime Minister.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 7/24/2006--Introduced. Congratulates the people of the Republic of Haiti for holding peaceful and democratic elections on February 7, 2006, resulting in the election of President Rene Preval and Prime Minister Jacques-Edouard Alexis. Expresses appreciation to Gerard Latortue for his service to Haiti during a tumultuous period of civil unrest, and recognizes Gerard Latortue's tenure as Interim Prime Minister of Haiti from March 12, 2004, to June 9, 2006.
